title: BREAKING: Chief Secretary of Andaman and Nicobar Islands Keshav Chandra suspended and Lieutenant Governor Admiral D.K. Joshi fined 5 lakhs, asked to be personally present before the circuit bench of the Calcutta High Court in Port Blair
